Articles.Content: I was reading a discussion on steam titled "The Kraken friend/foe (not the one on bob)",and under the 4th worst kraken a place called "The cursed spot on minmus" was brought up. I have googled it and nothing came up. What is "The cursed spot on Minmus?"
There are random spots where terrain panels come together. These are nottoriusly buggy and often summon the (@#$%&) Kracken
Thanks, Ill just steer clear of any spots that look odd/buggy.
Land very close to the North Pole, you will see a terrain panel with a corner slightly raised higher then the surrounding.
I'm surprised that no one has presented this video yet. (It's by Danny2462 so it's good. )
I noticed visible seams in the terrain when I was flying over Minmus the other day. Could see the stars through them. Didn't get close enough to show more than a couple of pixels wide though.

I'm surprised that no one has presented this video yet. (It's by Danny2462 so it's good. )

http://youtu.be/ZTVa2PuvGoM

Funny, its a crach zone under the ground, this will blow you up if you come inn so fast you clip the ground and he run into it then the rifted plate get to ground level.

Totally insane you could drive a rover on the underside if you used trust to hold you up.

Found one of this on Bop too.
